hackathon-description-text: Techweek is proud to host a 24-hour hackathon - join developers and hackers for an all-day frenzy of fun, camaraderie and coding. At the end, each team will have created an entirely new application that they will showcase to a panel of judges in the hopes of being crowned the winners!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Managing Director at KC Digital Drive

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Grand Prize Team will receive a $2000 Cash Prize (up to 4 members)
Grand Prize Team (4) and Runner-Up Team (4) members will receive a Techweek Executive Ticket to a 2016/2017 city of their choice ($150 value)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=The Globe Building, 1712 Main St, Kansas City, MO 64108, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Are you solving a real problem in an interesting way? You are not required to explain how your app makes money, unless that is part of the problem you solve.
How much progress did you make on your application?

hackathon-location-address: The Globe Building, 1712 Main St, Kansas City, MO 64108, USA
hackathon-description-header: Join us at the Think Big Partners for the 2nd Annual Techweek Kansas City Hackathon
